rect.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 0px; fill: rgb(236, 216, 161);

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Lato; font-size: 19px; font-weight: 900; white-space: pre;

rect.style: paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 0px; stroke: url("#color-5"); fill: url("#color-5");

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 9px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 9px; white-space: pre;

svg.text: Have ideas?​Want to join a Working group?​Get in touch with the NTCC!

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Lato; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 900; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 6px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 6px; white-space: pre;
text.tspan: Report to the Council of CTOs

text.style: fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: Lato; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 900; white-space: pre;
fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: Lato; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 900; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 6px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 9px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 9px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Lato; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; text-anchor: middle; text-transform: uppercase; white-space: pre;
fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-weight: 700; text-anchor: middle; text-transform: uppercase; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 9px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 9px; text-anchor: middle; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Lato; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 900; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 6px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Ubuntu; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
text.tspan: Throughout Canada, training in DRI covers a wide range of subjects in Advanced Research Computing, Research Data Management
and Cybersecurity. But the training is largely given by local and regional organization, which makes it hard for training staff to
coordinate and for users to find training events. The NTCC, established in 2024 by the Council of CTOs, aims to improve this situation.

text.style: fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
fill: url("#color-4"); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 7px; white-space: pre;
